item.title: 'Everything is gone' - Agony on a tight-knit LA street razed by inferno
item.description: Lifelong neighbours of West Las Flores Drive banded together, even as their community burned down.

item.title: LA firefighters battle to contain monster inferno as death toll rises
item.description: The Palisades blaze is threatening Brentwood, one of the most affluent enclaves of America's second-biggest city.

item.title: Sudanese army claims capture of key eastern city from rebels
item.description: The development marks one of the most significant gains for the army in its almost two-year long war with rebel forces.

item.title: Is it a bomb? Is it a plane crash? No, it's space junk landing
item.description: The Kenyan villagers surprised by falling satellite debris heralding a new year full of surprises.

item.title: Nostalgia and passion fuel young couple running old-school photo lab
item.description: Fabriccio and Luc√≠a run the only fully equipped film lab in Central America
